name: Cozy Hunt
description:
Cozy Hunt

Your friend Chloe has a new room to be decorated and she asked you to buy the furniture and turn the place into the most cozy and comfortable corner she could ever imagine.

Idea

Your job is simple. Have you ever played scavenger hunt? Well, now you will - but cozy! Run through the shop and scavenge to find what you feel will match the atmosphere of the room and later use it to decorate said place.

Scoring

You will be rated on how well you fulfilled the tasks Chloe gave you. You can also gain extra points by connecting different furniture sets together. But don't worry, in the end, the most important is how cozy you are!

Controls

WASD - movement

Shift - sprint

E - interact

R - rotate

LMB - select / place

RMB - remove

Space - skip
